reviewText: Do not buy this, the company is no longer in operation!! Check their website! memovies dot com
Bee and Me is the PERFECT gift for the pre-school set.  This DVD is high quality and I would reccommend it for a birthday gift! The kids love it and its a good price.

We've purchased both the original Bee and Me movie as well as Bee's Costume Party for our kids and a couple of our nephew's.  I must say that everyone gets a real kick out of seeing our little ones smiling faces/heads on the cute characters in these movies.  The kids ask to see them on a regular basis...Very well done and great customer service!

I bought this for my son for his 2nd birthday.  He is now 3 1/2 and the Bee & Me movie will STILL keep him occupied.  He LOVES seeing himself fly the plane,  drive the truck,  operate the crane on Block Island, etc.  He giggles and tells me THATS ME!  This is one of the best presents I have ever purchased for him,  definately better than those MUST HAVE toys.  This won't end up at the bottom of the toy box in 3 weeks.  Im looking forward to him getting the Costume Party DVD for Christmas.  Im sure he will be equally entertained with that DVD.
